statements: DELETE FROM HealthcareEquityResearchData WHERE bias_type = 'Gender Bias';
DELETE FROM HealthcareEquityResearchData WHERE researcher_id = 1 AND healthcare_provider_id = 2 AND patient_id = 3;
DELETE FROM HealthcareEquityResearchData WHERE bias_type = 'racial discrimination' AND patient_care_outcome = 'negative';
DELETE FROM Patient_Care_Outcomes WHERE patient_condition = 'Diabetes' AND patient_age > 50;
DELETE FROM Patient_Care_Outcomes WHERE patient_age < 50 AND patient_condition = 'Critical';
DELETE FROM Healthcare_Providers WHERE provider_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM researchers WHERE name = 'John Doe';
